title: Custom Text Selection
description: In this lab, we will explore the world of CSS programming and learn how to style web pages using various CSS properties and selectors. The purpose of this lab is to provide hands-on experience to beginners and intermediate level developers to enhance their skills in creating visually appealing web pages. Through this lab, you will also learn how to troubleshoot common CSS issues and use best practices in your coding.
